website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W290 is an excellent, well-balanced compact camera.
cons: No optical zoom while recording video

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Received the camera very quickly and in perfect condition. A good camera for the price. When the battery is low, but still able to take pictures, the screen gets stripes across it. The marks don't come out on the pictures, but it's disconcerting. Also, you have to be very careful when you press the buttons. The camera is very sensitive, and it is easy to erase more pictures than you intend to. The camera takes good pictures in different kinds of light, is easy to operate, and easy to understand. It also looks very nice. My son liked it, but this one is mine! I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: picture taker

customer_reviews.title: blurry & grainy pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera took blurry & grainy pictures indoors. compared to my old cannon S60 the quality is not good at all. All the rest is very good: The video is quality fantastic and the outdoors pictures are good. The interface and menus are easy to work with. I don't know if I got a lemon or if this is the standard quality. I returned this unit and will buy the cannon SD780. shame - wanted the wide angle view and the big zoom :-( Thank you amazon for a great costumer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera so that we had a new nicer camera for when our son was born! We love it, it takes great pictures, takes them fast, and havent had any problems, battery life is great, however we bought another battery because we didnt want to be screwed if one was dead because we forgot to charge.... highly recommend but get another battery...always nice to have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Good size for travel, and routine fun shooting. OK for an amateur photographer, but that's it. Has some good features, but not much zoom so be prepared. I do like the size, and weight, and of course the color. I have the blue. Have not used it for scenery, so can't comment. All in all, I like it enough to have given one to a good friend for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: SONY W-290
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new camera. I already had a SONY mid-size, which I love, so this one was easy to learn how to use. Very similar. I liked that it uses the same battery and memory stick,so they are interchangeable. Disappointed that the cord is not the same; it is something extra for me to take on trips. I love it for sharp close ups. It even does well for distance shots that I then crop. Of course, the blue color is great. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to be able to slip the camera in his/her pocket and take very clear pictures.The price was fair as well.
customer_reviews.author: IGS

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera and I sent it to my daughter as a gift. My intention was to give her something that I could have back: too many great cool pictures of my 6 months grandbaby-girl! And it worked!!! She just loved the gift and told me how amazing is to use the camera and to get shots of the baby's smile! Now I can see all the "faces" baby is making for grandmma! I do recomend this product especially if you live faraway from your family!
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Mulvaney

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber shot DSC-W290
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little point and shoot. Many extra features I didn't expect. Great quality pics. Fits into your shirt pocket very nicely. Good zoom.
customer_reviews.author: D. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W290
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to fit in my purse for special occassions. Primarily a wedding. While it took good pictures for the first 2 months of ownership, it began to fail horribly thereafter. After having the camera serviced twice in less than 2 years, it is now dead again. Perhaps this is a lemon, but no one should have to pay $200 for a brick. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.author: L. Natali

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little camera. The video feature is cool, that's the reason for the purchase. Although the zoom is not that far. After I purchased this camera from Amazon, I found it cheaper at Best Buy. Also, I could've taken it back and exchanged for the color my daughter really wanted if I had purchased from Best Buy. Anyway, it takes great pics and serves it purpose. I would purchase it again. It's the best buy for what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I want more
customer_reviews.text: I resently got a chance to start using the camera. So far, so good. I getting use to several features on this model. I would like to have the manuel controls that comes on the 300 model, especially the shutter speed selection. The size and weight of the camera are just right. A view finder would do some good. Overall I would recomend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Honeymoon camera!
customer_reviews.text: My new husband and I took this camera to Jamaica and had a blast with it! It was so easy to use and the twilight feature with no flash is amazing for those night photos! I highly recommend spending the extra money for this model. We couldn't have wonderful pictures from our honeymoon to share with all of our friends and family without this camera! The video was amazing and the playback of videos have easy viewing with the big screen. We also loved how small and portable so having it in a bag on the beach was no problem! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Campos

customer_reviews.title: Camera for Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: The pictues from this camera are awesome. The only complaint I have - sometimes it doesn't take the time to focus and I get an occasional blurry photo. It could be me, I want to click quickly, but the quality of the photos are unbelievable. I use this camera as an additional one since I have a Nikon D300 too. So glad I bought it to take to Hawaii. It's lightweight and easy to take anywhere. The 5X zoom comes in handy. The flower pictures are clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Opfer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sony Camera Perfect shots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera as described Scratches no big deal..Great pics and focus as I want..Love the blue color Great size..wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Sony digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great as a snap and shoot camera. The bigger lens helps capture larger area. Only draw back is the continuous shooting feature. It needs to be enable/disable in the setup menu. You cannot select it on the fly. Basically makes it almost unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I only have 2 days with the cam, and i love it, take amazing pics no matter what, the quality of the video is really great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Shame on SONY. The WORST camera I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very happy about this little SONY camera: Cool and stylish. Small and solid. Quick point and shoot... Until I saw the pictures on my computer! Seriously, those are simply the WORST pictures I have ever seen! The colors are not correct. The pictures are soft and FUZZY. In the same room, my ancient SAMASUNG Digimax S700 takes way sharper pictures than this SONY junk! I have had enough of this SONY junk after around 80 shots; it is going back! STAY AWAY FROM SONY DSC-W290 camera. Yeah, some camera it is.
customer_reviews.author: RXFS

customer_reviews.title: Cam
customer_reviews.text: Soon as I got it I saw it cheaper on the same site. But as the product itself pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Parks

customer_reviews.title: price, portability, quality.
customer_reviews.text: great quality weight, so far very durable. buttons are somewhat small, but work for my hands (has an easy function for simplicity!) love the quality of pictures and user-friendliness. a huge plus is the HD video capability... great asset. this camera is compatible with my Mac OS X, macbook, and loads easily into i-photo etc. definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: rynmrrs

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is advertized to do and is a great little work camera. Fits in a breast pocket and can get into tight spaces for documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Niels Bogh

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice camara
customer_reviews.text: I like very much this camera!It would be nicer if it had a manual setting.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ynsfran Mallorquin

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! It knows what I want before I want it. Takes great close-ups, landscapes and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product and price. Order exactly as described and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with this transaction all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased with this transaction all the way around, from purchase to shipping to quality of item, All Good! Thank You...
customer_reviews.author: Jule D.

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W290 12 MP Digital Camera w/5x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: It was a discontinued model that had the upgraded lens that I was looking for so, I bought it. It meets my expectations quite well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use & intelligent camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera thinking of giving it as a gift to my mom. I used to to see how it is, and now I have decided to keep it myself and buy another for my mom. I have used Canon S3IS for 2.5 years now. This Sony camera is better than my old Canon. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay S. Rajanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my digital camera- saved me a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine B. Cockrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and arrived in two days!!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: great camera for every day use
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for our 13 year old. She finds it easy to use and handy. The memory card does require a device that fits over it in order to create photos at a store. This sleeve was not included in the camera and we have not been able to find one anywhere. The photo shop we use does have one.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Bellott Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love the color!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with the camera. I love the video quality and if you set it up right, the pictures are phanominal. This camera is definitely a value at the price. The color is a very sharp, ice blue, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Norman F. Kosty

customer_reviews.title: Years ago when I've first bought it, I became completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This last purchase was done in order ot replace my old one that got water inside when diving (o-ring problems).
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: not real happy
customer_reviews.text: One of the few things I've bought through this site that I don't like. We've had many problems with this camera and eventually replaced it with a different camera bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We have only had our camera for one month but so far we love it. It takes great pictures and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Hobert

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It is a great first camera. My wife loves it because is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera!!! Super easy to use, great picture quality, and looks sharp!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri M. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, has some fun features, like the smile recognition, and the interface is reasonably easy to use after a bit of a play getting used to where everything is. It turns on quite quickly and takes nice photos, the only small complaint I have is that it is a little bigger than I would ideally like from a compact camera
customer_reviews.author: C. McOmish

customer_reviews.title: A Camera that you can count on.
customer_reviews.text: I deffintely like it. It is easy to use with a great quality of pictures. An item that you can use for official and personal memories.
customer_reviews.author: Sharaf E. Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this camera. Easy to use and very good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: love the look and the performance. good value for money. my first sony camera and im not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Cyber-shot I lost.. Easy to use, takes pics with a little movement and they come out crisp. Movies are lovely. Very happy with my purchase. I love SONY
customer_reviews.author: OBXluvr

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W290 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization (Dark Blue) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueFeatures 

 

12.1-megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor 5x optical zoom, 28mm wide-angle Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens; Optical SteadyShot image stabilization 720p high-definition movie capture; BIONZ image processor 3.0-inch (230K pixels) Clear Photo LCD; Face Detection and Smile Shutter technology 11MB built-in memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/PRO Duo Media (not included)
feature_bullets: 5x optical zoom, 28mm wide-angle Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens; Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
720p high-definition movie capture; BIONZ image processor
3.0-inch (230K pixels) Clear Photo LCD; Face Detection and Smile Shutter technology
11MB built-in memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/PRO Duo Media (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars115 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
